body: This narrow cloth flag is made to attach to the end a knight's lance, though it can be flown from a spear, polearm, or even a staff. It has no effect if not mounted appropriately. A knight's pennon grants different benefits depending on its color and design.
name: Knight's Pennon
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Knights Pennon

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Knights Pennon/Battle

sections.body: The red knight's pennon of battle allows its bearer to benefit from heroism once per day.

sections.name: Battle

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Knights Pennon/Honor

sections.body: The gold knight's pennon of honor bestows protection from evil upon the bearer once per day.

sections.name: Honor

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Knights Pennon/Parley

sections.body: The white knight's pennon of parley, when displayed approaching a negotiation, grants the bearer a +4 enhancement bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, and Sense Motive checks for 1 hour, so long as the bearer does not initiate any hostile action.

sections.name: Parley
